metadata.title: CVE-2019-5837 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Resource size information leakage in Blink in Google Chrome prior to75.0.3770.80 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
